Objects & JSON

Learning Objectives

At the end of this class, you will be able to:

  • Understand how scope works
  • Determine the scope of local and global variables
  • Describe what hoisting does

Objects & JSON

Agenda

  • Variable scope
  • The var, let, and const keywords
  • Hoisting
